interface.name: CopyOption
interface.javadoc:
An object that configures how to copy or move a file.

Objects of this type may be used with the {@link Files#copy(Path,Path,CopyOption[]) Files.copy(Path,Path,CopyOption...)},{@link Files#copy(java.io.InputStream,Path,CopyOption[])Files.copy(InputStream,Path,CopyOption...)} and {@link Files#moveFiles.move(Path,Path,CopyOption...)} methods to configure how a file is copied or moved.

The {@link StandardCopyOption} enumeration type defines the standard options. 1.7
